name: Kerry Hotel Beijing

reviews.text: A wonderful hotel within good locations of Beijing. Very comfortable and beautiful decorations. Friendly staff too.
reviews.title: Best in Chaoyang !

reviews.text: If you like gym and swimming pool, this must be your kind of hotel. GYM is open 24hrs.
reviews.title: Best Choice at GuoMao (World Trade Center) Location

reviews.text: At Beijings World Trade Center you have a good Choice of Hotels: From China World Hotel, Summit Wing, Traders Hotel, to Kerry Center Hotel you can find four hotels operated by Shangri-La Group. From Price-Service/Quality relation point of view, the Kerry Center is best, excellent buffet restaurant, very good bar in evening, and moreover not too expensive - related to Beijing and its location...
reviews.title: The best clubroom personnel!

reviews.text: This Kerry has undergone renovation for the bedrooms and club room and is now in the process of converting the lower level to a shopping/ business section. The bedrooms are very comfortable and the bathrooms afford a great deal of space. If you stay on the club floors, you have access to the club room as well as a complimentary array of soft drinks, hot drinks and snacks in the room mini fridge. During the course of our stay there, we breakfasted in the clubroom on the 8th floor and also availed ourselves of the "Happy Hour" in the evening on a few occasions when we weren't involved in other activities. The personnel there were wonderful and always welcomed us by name. In turn we got to know them also. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay there and my husband will return on business.
reviews.title: Excellent, comfortable stay. Would not hesitate to return or recommend

reviews.text: There was nothing I could fault.
reviews.title: Best hotel in China

reviews.text: One of the best hotels I have stayed at. Excellent rooms, courteous staff and a great sports facility.
reviews.title: Superb Experience!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel smells "new" perhaps because of the multi million dollar refurbishment. The rooms are tastefully decorated with great amenities. The beds are huge and the toilets have a fully automated flush and wash system! The sports facility is huge with a 25m pool, great jacuzzi and sauna. The location too is great with the Silk Market and The Place on walking distance.
reviews.title: Amazing Facilities = Wow Effect

reviews.text: The best gym facilities I have ever seen. Huge indoor pool, Jacuzzi in both men and women Changing rooms.
reviews.title: All round great Hotel

reviews.text: Very clean room, free Mini Bar, cozy bed, free shoe shine, high tech toilet bowl, strong shower and a tub.
reviews.title: Very High Class - helpful staff, but restuarants a little slow

reviews.text: Definitely a good choice for business travelers and couples. Worth my time and $ in the bar, from 8pm onwards, the Jackson Twins and the band were really good. It would be better if the bar can attempt to segregate smoking and non smoking area, however, I don't think that's possible in China.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.text: if you have business at this corner of Beijing I will advise to stay at this hotel
reviews.title: good value

reviews.text: Nice room, furnished with all needed goods
reviews.title: Excellent all round

reviews.text: service is very good and breakfast is great
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.text: around the hotel you can find small shops if you need to buy some emergency shopping
reviews.title: good location, large corporate hotel but nice rooms, lively lounge

reviews.text: Great service, smooth check in, friendly staff, decent sized rooms (though no particular view), good bathroom/shower. The hotel has recently been refurbished so all facilities are new and work well. Stayed in club room which included use of club lounge (pre dinner drinks, breakfast, meeting room facilities), well worth getting. Swimming pool is fabulous and gym facilities excellent, we ate at the Horizon Chinese restaurant which was very good. There is also a popular bar called Centro in the ground floor (one of the best in town) and the hotel is linked via walkway to China World Trade Center. The only down side was that parts of the hotel were still being renovated and there were the inevitable paint smell, but that is a small detail when compared to overall excellency of this hotel. Great breakfast selection and standard, good choice of hotel in CBD.
reviews.title: Attentive, timely, caring.

reviews.text: The Kerry was suggested by our local office, as it is in close proximity to the highest building in Beijing, the World Summit Tower, where my company's office is located. It is a bit cheaper than the hotel in the World Summit Tower, but the price was still high compared to some other hotels available in Beijing. From a price value perspective, this is an excellent choice though.
reviews.title: Top Hotel in Beijing's Business District

reviews.text: The check-in was very efficient and friendly. The rooms are spacious, impeccably clean and have a modern design. Everything is very functional and there are plenty of amenities. There is an iPod/iPhone (older plug though) music docking station, high tech toilet seat for perfect hygene, in-mirror TV in the bathroom, Nespresso coffee maker, water heater, bathroom amenities from l'Occitane, well working wifi and minbar (including beer, but no wine or high percentage alcoholics) included in the room price, anti-allergic pillow, office amenities (ruler, pens, shapener, ethernet cable, etc.) and a panel with various plug-in capabilities (USB charger, video connection, etc.). The bed was very comfortable and I slept very well. There is really not a lot more that can be desired.
reviews.title: Nice property. Well worth the money.

reviews.text: The gym is also perfect, modern and free of charge: Very spacious with tread mills and other cardio equipment, as well as a good selection of weight machines. I did not use the pool, but it is available and looked very nice. Lockers, towels and water are provided.
reviews.title: Home away from home

reviews.text: In respect to food, I used Kerry's Kitchen for dinner and breakfast. The dinner selection is Asian-Fusion cuisine. The food was very good and the service very attentive. The breakfast buffet had a large selection of Asian and international items of highest quality and the service was great as well.
reviews.title: Top of the pick

reviews.text: The check-out process was also very friendly, uncomplicated and quick. My stay could not have been better and I was very impressed by the Kerry. I definitely recommend this hotel when going to Beijing and are willing to spend some money on your accommodation.
reviews.title: Service and amenities is top notch

description: Kerry Hotel, Beijing, a stylish, modern luxury hotel, is situated in the Chaoyang district - Beijing's diplomatic, commercial and financial center. The city's popular historical sites, such as the Forbidden City, are also just short distances away, making it ideal for both business and leisure travelers. All 486 rooms and suites have a contemporary design with the comforts and conveniences of the ultra-modern home. It also boasts some of the largest conference facilities amongst hotels in Beijing.Situated in Beijing’s central business district and just 25 minutes from the international airport, Kerry Hotel, Beijing’s location is enhanced by its proximity to major cultural, shopping and entertainment sites.The hotel’s stylish interior is matched by modern day comforts such as complimentary Wi-Fi connectivity throughout the hotel, all 486 guestrooms, function space, and even in the limousines. Paperless check-in and check-out and complimentary mini bar upon arrival, are some of the hotel’s signature services.Wine and dine facilities are presented through four establishments. Kerry’s Kitchen delivers authentic Asian cuisine, while Kerry’s Pantry is a gourmet deli. The Horizon Chinese specialises in authentic Cantonese cuisine, along with Beijing and Sichuan signature dishes. An award-winning bar and lounge, Centro features live jazz, fine wines and real cocktails in a seductive atmosphere.With more than 6,000sqm of function space, the hotel is the preferred choice for star-studded galas, meetings and conventions. Spread across three levels at 6,000sqm, Kerry Sports features a 24-hour gymnasium, indoor swimming pool, multi-purpose courts and a recreation room, plus an outdoor jogging track.
